net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base

Class AbstractSearchIndexerMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableObject
      • net.sf.mmm.util.cli.api.AbstractMain
        • net.sf.mmm.util.cli.api.AbstractVersionedMain
          • net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.AbstractSearchIndexerMain
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchIndexerMain

    @CliMode(id="default",
         usage="Perform search-indexing according to the configuration.")
public abstract class AbstractSearchIndexerMain
extends AbstractVersionedMain
    This is the abstract base-class for a fully integrated main program that triggers the search-indexer according to a given configuration. It allows to do complex indexing of files from arbitrary sources.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

        @CliOption(name="--config",
           aliases="-c",
           required=false,
           operand="FILE",
           usage="The XML-configuration file. The default is {default}.")

        The optional filename of the configuration XML-file.

      • overwrite

        @CliOption(name="--overwrite",
           required=false,
           usage="Overwrite the search-index and reindex from scratch. If combined with --source, only the entries of the specified source(s) are overwritten.")
private boolean overwrite
        The option to overwrite the search-index and re-index from scratch.

      • optimize

        @CliOption(name="--optimized",
           required=false,
           usage="Optimize the search-index after indexing. This will cause some performance overhead after indexing but will typically speed up your searches. Default is {default}.")
private Boolean optimize
        The option to optimize the index at the end of indexing.

      • sources

        @CliOption(name="--source",
           required=false,
           operand="SOURCE",
           usage="Only update the specified source-ID(s) in the index.")
private List<String> sources
        The option defining an optional List of source-IDs that should be updated in index rather than all sources.

    • Method Detail

      • getIocContainer

        protected abstract IocContainer getIocContainer()
        An IocContainer is required. Override this method to provide it. This method gets the IocContainer used to manage components with their implementation. It should be created and initialized on the first call of this method.
        This default implementation simply returns null to avoid dependencies on a IocContainer implementation. Override this method to use proper component management.
        Overrides:
        getIocContainer in class AbstractMain
        Returns:
        the IocContainer.
        See Also:
        SpringContainer

      • runDefaultMode

        protected int runDefaultMode()
        This method is called from AbstractVersionedMain.run(CliModeObject) if the program is executed in default mode.
        Specified by:
        runDefaultMode in class AbstractVersionedMain
        Returns:
        the error-code or AbstractMain.EXIT_CODE_OK on success.
